p.k: We got hits. We got hits from the 80s. And guess what? They don't stop! You're welcome!
Pencil us in because we've organised the greatest hits of the '80s for you. ou're welcome!
We've gone back to the 80s here at MTV and we're saluting big hair, power suits and a decade of pure pop icons. It's non-stop nostalgia right here at MTV 80s!
We've chosen all of the best 80s hits to go into one epic 80s party playlist. So pump up the volume and get ready to dance with some classic 80s tunes!
Get ready because we're bringing you nothing but classic hits and iconic anthems from the 80s!
